Package com.sociam.android

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MainActivity.GetDateFromCallback
    This interface is used for call back function from async task
    MainMsgDetailFragmentReplyDialog.ReplyMessageFragmentCallback  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataApplication
    Extended for Application class.
    DrawerAdapter
    This is custom ArrayAdapter for Navigation Drawer.
    EvaluateAsyncTask
    This class used for updating user vote.
    EvaluateDialogFragment
    The class extending Dialogfragment is used to show a evaluate dialog screen.
    GetDataFromServerAsyncTask
    This async task class is to obtain crime/message data as a csv file from the server.
    ImageDownloader
    The class is to download image of a crime from the server.
    MainActivity
    Main class for the application.
    MainMessageDetailFragmentDialog
    This class extending DialogFragment is to show a dialog which show the detail of message.
    MainMsgDetailFragmentReplyDialog
    This class is to show a dialog screen of replying a message.
    MapMainFragment
    This class set up map view in main screen.
    ReplyMessageAsyncTask
    This class is used for creating async task to update a reply message to the server.
    ReportDetailDialogFragment  
    UpdateTagAsyncTask
    This class (extending AsyncTask) update local tag file which stored as csv file from the server.
    UserHeropointAsyncTask
    This class (extending AsyncTask) is used for obtaining hero point of the user from the server.
    UserPreferenceDialog
    This class (extending DialogFragment) is to show user setting.
    UserPreferenceTagDialog
    This class (extending DialogFregment) is used to show Tag for UserSetting
